text: On the early morning of February 10, 2025, a bus fell of a bridge into the Las Vacas River in Guatemala City, Guatemala. The accident killed at least 56 people and injured 9 others more. President Bernardo Arevalo declared three days of national mourning and sent the Guatemalan army along with the disaster agency to help with the response efforts. ==References== Category:February 2025 events Category:Guatemala City Category:2020s in Guatemala Category:2025 in North America Category:2025 disasters Category:2020s disasters in North America Category:Transport disasters in Europe
title: 2025 Guatemala City bus crash
